definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs

sentences.english: It is considered that it is necessary to raise people's awareness of cadmium pollution and protection of ecological environment.
sentences.chinese: 提高人們加強防治鎘污染，保護生態環境的意識。

sentences.english: Earthworms and other essential soil organisms are extremely susceptive to cadmium poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓和其他主要的土壤生物都非常容易鎘中毒。

sentences.english: Sb and Zn was more prominent than that in the analysis of In.
sentences.chinese: 它在鎘銻鋅分析中的作用比錮鉍鉛中明顯。

sentences.english: Cadmium contained in the cadmium oxide of a thick film ceramic substrate.
sentences.chinese: 厚膜陶瓷基質的氧化鎘中所含的鎘。

sentences.english: The induction of metallothionein (MT) was studied in the housefly larvae ( Musca domestica).
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了家蠅幼蟲體內鎘金屬硫蛋白的誘導合成。

sentences.english: It showed that taurine could decrease the breaks of DNA injured by CdCl2.
sentences.chinese: 說明牛磺酸可以減少氯化鎘引起的DNA斷裂。

sentences.english: The serum nitrate are measured with a copper-coated cadmium reduction method.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道用鍍銅鎘還原法測定血清硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cell molecular mechanism of cadmium-induced renal damage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鎘中毒性腎損害的細胞分子學機制。

sentences.english: On the contrary, cadmium contamination induces iron deficiency in plants.
sentences.chinese: 相反，鎘污染將誘導植物的鐵營養缺乏。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of cadmium induced renal oxidative damage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鎘對腎氧化損傷的作用機制。

sentences.english: Heavy metals can occur the large-scale cell death of tobacco suspension cultures.
sentences.chinese: 鎘脅迫會造成菸草懸浮細胞大規模死亡。

sentences.english: The cadmium sulfate is selectively dissolved in alcohol solution.
sentences.chinese: 特別選用乙醇溶液浸取硫酸鎘，降低了氧化鎘的干擾。

sentences.english: It is well documented that cadmium oxide is an excellent adhesion promoter in thick film gold paste.
sentences.chinese: 鎘氧化物在厚膜金漿料中可以起到很好的粘附作用。

sentences.english: Taurine possesses protective activity against cadmium-induced DNA damage and hydroxy radical scavenging activity in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 牛磺酸在體外對氯化鎘引起的DNA損傷有預防作用。

sentences.english: Cadmium is a heavy metal element with accumulation toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 鎘是一種有毒的重金屬元素，具有蓄積性毒性。

definition: operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
